name: Wild Romance
description: Unhappy with his life in Tokyo, Kazuma returns to his hometown in the Japanese countryside where he reconnects with four classmates. When the girls accidentally reveal that they are not mere humans, a journey of discovery and constant flirtation begins.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Celeron 333 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
